content.title: Fierce Bear and Wolf
content.creator:
Cross Lances
January 26, 2025
content.content:
We are now at the end of this campaign.
I thank everyone for participating, it was very engaging and fun.
Therefore, I decided to make a final effort and make two more bookmarks to close a set.
Together with the deer model in fact these perfectly close the “druid” themed set.
So here is a wolf and a bear to add to your collection!
Thank you so much for all your support!

content.title: Sword and Shield
content.creator:
Cross Lances
January 25, 2025
content.content:
Thank you all for the good wishes received!
But we have a campaign to run!
We are in the last days but there is still a margin for a little something.
Today we propose a theme that you suggested, but we have interpreted it a bit in our own way with this sword and shield!
We have time for one last bookmark, so go wild and let's see who brings us the best inspiration :D

comments.text: A Fenrir Wolf head!
I would love a legally distinct orc skull glyph
you catch me unprepared, I don't really know what it is. Do you have any reference?

content.title: Today is my birthday!
content.creator:
Cross Lances
January 24, 2025
content.content:
yes, today is my birthday but I decided to give you more gifts.
Two more bookmarks for today.
One was born from another one of your suggestions, the second one I made to my taste, my passion after art is biking so I wanted to share this little thing with you.
What do you think do you like them?

comments.text: Happy Birthday!
Happy Birthday!! I really like the bicycle bookmark.
Happy birthday
Happy Birthday. Don't be working too hard!
Happy Birthday, and thank you so much.
Happy Birthday!!!

content.title: Frankenstein
content.creator:
Cross Lances
January 24, 2025
content.content:
Another day and another bookmark.
I must say they are a lot of fun to sculpt.
Only a few more days to go but we will try to increase our stretch goals again!
For today, however, we made a frankenstein as d our tip!

content.title: Letters
content.creator:
Cross Lances
January 22, 2025
content.content:
This update has been very strenuous.
We realized another of your requests: letters.
But could we create something simple with a font?it seems obvious to me that no, so we decided to do something more elaborate with floral decorations.It was a long work but I hope you like it!

comments.text: You guys are awesome. Love it!

content.title: Heraldic Dragon
content.creator:
Cross Lances
January 22, 2025
content.content:
Did you ask us for a dragon? And a dragon you shall have!
We made one in heraldic style and hope you like it!

Unfortunately, we are still having serious problems with our internet provider, and it is not allowing us to be as present as we would have liked.
But fear not, because behind the scenes we are sculpting more bookmarks for you!
See you soon!

comments.text: Love it. Thanks for the dragon. Know you gotta be careful in what you design but anything in the style of a master sword or Zelda theme?
I can't promise anything, but I'll think about it :D
looks great, id like to see an elephant or bear bookmark
I don't mind the bear idea, also because it can be used as an alternative to the druid's deer.

content.title: Adventurers
content.creator:
Cross Lances
January 20, 2025
content.content:
Good morning!
We have been without internet line for two days, which is causing us quite a few problems with an ongoing kickstarter campaign.
But in spite of everything, we managed to work on some of your requests again today, and there will still be a lot of news coming in the next few days.
So we are inserting four new bookmarks that complete some missing classes for roleplaying games: druid- barbarian- artificer and monk!

comments.text: I'd love to see a Dracula, Frankenstein, Jekyll and Hyde, Wolfman, Phantom of the Opera, and fairytale ones. Snow white Apple, Cinderella Shoe, Red riding hood wolf, Stuff like that :) Also, some for Romance. Can't wait to get these! I've been looking or bookmarks for months! Thank you!
so many great ideas as always, we will definitely try to implement some of them in the coming days!

content.title: Sauron Bookmark
content.creator:
Cross Lances
January 18, 2025
content.content:
And here is the first stretch goal born from one of your comments.
You had asked us for more Lord of the Rings-themed bookmarks, and here is the eye of sauron!

comments.text: any dragons style ones?

content.title: goal achieved and first stretch goal!
content.creator:
Cross Lances
January 17, 2025
content.content:
We thank you, as always, for your quick participation in each of our projects!
The goal was reached quickly.
Now the most beautiful but also challenging phase of the campaign begins: making lots of stretch goals for you, so we are waiting for your suggestions and ideas so that we can expand this campaign more and more!
But in the meantime comes the first gift, another Egyptian-themed bookmark.

comments.text: Yay, congratulations! Could we get D&D class symbols, wizard, warlock, Druid etc. ? Also, alphabet - would be good for monster manuals etc to have each section marked for easy perusal.

hello, you can find the classes in the add-on package with the old bookmarks. They were made in previous campaigns. You can see them here: https://i.kickstarter.com/assets/047/862/583/ed2f2abc55e83a1ead6de13ac8f49801_original.png?fit=scale-down&origin=ugc&q=100&v=1737105521&width=680&sig=Li9lRfWNhL7i6TfDA1%2B1QMvz%2Fci3RtIkBeeEZAYFRlA%3D For the letters it looks nice, but sculpting all the letters is challenging by the end of the campaign, let's see what can be done.
Thanks, I added on the old one :-) but maybe missed all the classes or didn’t associate them myself. Thank you for responding.

yes, some classes are missing, I may implement them between now and the end of the campaign, for now there are: fighter (sword), wizard-sorcerer(scepter), paladin (hammer), ranger (bow), bard (lute paddle). Needed would be: barbarian-druid-monk and artificer I would say.
Hello and congratulations for your work. Is it possible to make astrological signs, Wicca symbols, Magic or others please? Thanks in advance and lots of good things.
sure, I will mark your ideas and try to implement it as a stretch goal in the next few days!
Looking forward to seeing your amazing designs, as always! Are you doing any Lord of the Rings themed designs this time?
hello, yes there is the hobbit house, but I can create others with a lord of the rings theme.
